entry.title: PyOhio 2011: Creating Web APIs that are a joy to use
entry.summary:
Description

Creating Web APIs that are a joy to use

Presented by Issac Kelly

Issac is an avid API consumer. He&aposll cover how to make an API that is not terrible. This is apparently very difficult to do, and many anti-patterns will be shown. No care will be taken to protect the guilty. This talk is not as focused on Python, as it is on creating Web APIs, and an understanding of HTTP is assumed.
